The End!(Tragic)
(K)Press K
Listen to the rebels.
After listening to the rebels for half an hour you learned a lot about the Keep. 
You finally decide to go. 
Just as you move to go, the rebels notice you and attack. You manage to defend yourself quite well with the spear. 
However, in the end the rebels are able to take you as a prisoner.
But they are impressed with your fighting skills and quickly recruit you for their cause. 
You become one of The Starved. 
You die a few years later in an assassination attempt against the rulers of Riverfoot Keep.
